comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, likely from a classical dictionary or text such as the Shuowen Jiezi. The text includes both seal script (篆书) and regular script (楷书), with explanations of character meanings, pronunciations (using反切), and etymologies. The right margin contains page numbers and section identifiers like '小三百十九', '言文一四', '二', and '魏三'. The entire block is enclosed in a thick black border.
